--- revoke_on_table_fqn.sql
REVOKE SELECT ON TABLE s.t FROM ROLE r

--- AST
&ast.Revoke{
  Privilege: &ast.PrivilegeOnTable{
    Privileges: []ast.TablePrivilege{
      &ast.SelectPrivilege{
        Select: 7,
        Rparen: -1,
      },
    },
    Names: []*ast.Path{
      &ast.Path{
        Idents: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 23,
            NameEnd: 24,
            Name:    "s",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 25,
            NameEnd: 26,
            Name:    "t",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
  Roles: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 37,
      NameEnd: 38,
      Name:    "r",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
REVOKE SELECT ON TABLE s.t FROM ROLE r
